flawed_nl_solution:
James is 37-15=<<37-15=22>>22 years old
So 8 years ago he was 22-8=<<22-8=14>>14 years old
That means Janet was 14/2=<<14/2=7>>7 years old 8 years ago
So Janet is now 7+8=<<7+8=15>>15 years old
That means Susan is 15-3=<<15-3=9>>9 years old
So in 5 years she will be 9+5=<<9+5=14>>14 years old
#### 14

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 9. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
